bug.short_desc: [detail] Number format detail pane uses internal org.eclipse.debug.ui classes.

long_desc.thetext: These include DebugUIPlugin, IDebugHelpContextIds, LazyModelPresentation, and bunch of others. These are not part of any provisional APIs, so instead of referencing them, their functionality should be copied. This is not ideal but necessary to avoid maintanance issues.
Created attachment 99065 Reorganized detail work for numbers and modules

Pawel
I committed the changes. They fall in to 3 categories
1.) Reworked detail stuff for general reorg 2.) Copied stuff from debug.ui internal so we no longer reference it 3.) Cleaned up some warnings ( non API )
I left the more complicated TextViewer for now. Just did not have the time to work on it. Perhaps in 1.1. But it is functional and limited in what it does.
Please review
Randy
Verified. Thanks Randy, I filed a separate bug 230936 to the remaining work item.

attachment.desc: Reorganized detail work for numbers and modules
